messages.content:
using HTML5 canvas, draw a human skeleton using 206 white lines, store in a bitmap; tile the background with the bitmap; every second, save the current background in a bitmap, scale 10%, and tile the next background with it.
Make sure everything is in a single HTML file with embedded CSS and JS in a single code block to be used as a web app.

the background should be black
